name: Testing stock_list function
description:
Testing stock_list function with various test data [with list_of_art=['ROXANNE 102', 'RHODODE 123', '...', 'BTSQZFG 239', 'DRTYMKH 060'], list_of_cat=['B', 'R', 'D', 'X'], expected='(B : 364) - (R : 225) - (D : 60) - (X : 0)'].

        :return:
descriptionHtml:
Codewars badge:

Test Description:

You will be given a stock-list (e.g. : L) and a list of categories in capital letters. Your task is to verify that the function finds all the books of L with codes belonging to each category of M and to sum their quantity according to each category.

steps.name: Enter test data (['ROXANNE 102', 'RHODODE 123', 'BKWRKAA 125', 'BTSQZFG 239', 'DRTYMKH 060'], ['B', 'R', 'D', 'X']) and verify the expected output ((B : 364) - (R : 225) - (D : 60) - (X : 0)) vs actual result ((B : 364) - (R : 225) - (D : 60) - (X : 0))
